segments.text: Didn ’ t you punch in this morning , Monica ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I don ’ t know the rule about punching .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s ok . I should have told you earlier . This is a company rule .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do we also need to punch out after work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: According to the company rule , we should punch in before 8 o ’ clock and punch out after 5 o ’ clock every work day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the lunch break , Lucy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask whether we need to work overtime ?
segments.speaker: S2
